description: pick up and move monster spawners using silk touch

permissions.description: Allows you to see informative messages about the spawners as you place and break them
permissions.name: silkspawners.info

permissions.description: Allows you to use silk touch to acquire mob spawner items
permissions.name: silkspawners.silkdrop.*

permissions.description: Allows you to destroy mob spawners to acquire mob spawn eggs / iron bars / XP (as configured)
permissions.name: silkspawners.destroydrop.*

permissions.description: Allows you to view the spawner type using /spawner
permissions.name: silkspawners.viewtype

permissions.description: Allows you to change the spawner type using /spawner [creature]
permissions.name: silkspawners.changetype.*

permissions.description: Allows you to change the spawner type by left-clicking with a spawn egg
permissions.name: silkspawners.changetypewithegg.*

permissions.description: Allows you to get spawner items in your hand for free using /spawner [creature]
permissions.name: silkspawners.freeitem.*

permissions.description: Allows you to get spawn eggs in your hand for free using /spawner [creature]egg
permissions.name: silkspawners.freeitemegg.*

permissions.description: Allows you to craft all spawners
permissions.name: silkspawners.craft.*

permissions.description: Allows you to place all spawners
permissions.name: silkspawners.place.*

permissions.description: Allows you to reload the plugin
permissions.name: silkspawners.reload

permissions.description: Allows you to receive drops on explosion
permissions.name: silkspawners.explodedrop
